output_rules:
[
  "rule C2_Domains_Detection {
    meta:
        description = "Detects C2 domain names associated with malicious activities"
        creation_date = "2020-12-24"
    strings:
        $domain1 = "borg.wtf"
        $domain2 = "teamtnt.red"
        $domain3 = "irc.borg.wtf"
        $domain4 = "sampwn.anondns.net"
    condition:
        any of them
}",
  "rule C2_IP_Addresses_Detection {
    meta:
        description = "Detects IP addresses used by C2 to host malicious files or connect to malware"
    strings:
        $ip1 = "45.9.150.36"
        $ip2 = "147.75.47.199"
        $ip3 = "45.9.148.108"
        $ip4 = "123.245.9.147"
        $ip5 = "164.68.106.96"
        $ip6 = "62.234.121.105"
    condition:
        any of them
}",
  "rule Malicious_File_Names_Detection {
    meta:
        description = "Detects files associated with malicious scripts and binaries"
    strings:
        $file1 = "TDGG"
        $file2 = "tt.sh"
        $file3 = "api.key"
        $file4 = "tmate"
        $file5 = "sGAU.sh"
        $file6 = "kshell"
        $file7 = "install_monerod.bash"
        $file8 = "setup_moneroocean_miner.sh"
        $file9 = "xmrig"
        $file10 = "pei.sh"
        $file11 = "pei64"
        $file12 = "pei32"
        $file13 = "xmr3.assi"
        $file14 = "aws2.sh"
        $file15 = "t.sh"
        $file16 = "x86_64.so"
        $file17 = "xmrig.so"
        $file18 = "xmr.sh"
        $file19 = "ziggy"
    condition:
        any of them
}",
  "rule Cryptojacking_Wallet_Detection {
    meta:
        description = "Detects hardcoded wallet addresses used for cryptojacking"
    strings:
        $wallet = {34 38 38 75 79 56 71 53 71 68 70 76 37 48 37 37 76 48 74 6D 57 5A 5A 37 4A 4E 7A 6E 48 63 6A 32 54 35 50 74 6A 5A 69 47 5A 63 45 4E 63 6B 59 48 5A 4E 54 54 7A 45 33 4C 7A 32 48 5A 6B 69 4D 7A 71 61 79 79 31 39 73 59 44 63 42 47 44 43 6A 6F 57 62 54 66 4C 42 6E 63 33 74 63 39 72 47 34 59 38 67 58 51 38 66 4A 69 50 35 74 71 65 42 64 61}
    condition:
        any of them
}",
  "rule Malicious_Script_SHA256_Detection {
    meta:
        description = "Detects malicious scripts and binaries by their SHA256 hash"
    strings:
        $sha1 = "2c1528253656ac09c7473911b24b243f083e60b98a19ba1bbb050979a1f38a0f"
        $sha2 = "2cde98579162ab165623241719b2ab33ac40f0b5d0a8ba7e7067c7aebc530172"
        $sha3 = "b34df4b273b3bedaab531be46a0780d97b87588e93c1818158a47f7add8c7204"
        $sha4 = "d2fff992e40ce18ff81b9a92fa1cb93a56fb5a82c1cc428204552d8dfa1bc04f"
        $sha5 = "74e3ccaea4df277e1a9c458a671db74aa47630928a7825f75994756512b09d64"
        $sha6 = "8e33496ea00218c07145396c6bcf3e25f4e38a1061f807d2d3653497a291348c"
        $sha7 = "518a19aa2c3c9f895efa0d130e6355af5b5d7edf28e2a2d9b944aa358c23d887"
        $sha8 = "5923f20010cb7c1d59aab36ba41c84cd20c25c6e64aace65dc8243ea827b537b"
        $sha9 = "a22c2a6c2fdc5f5b962d2534aaae10d4de0379c9872f07aa10c77210ca652fa9"
        $sha10 = "ee6dbbf85a3bb301a2e448c7fddaa4c1c6f234a8c75597ee766c66f52540d015"
        $sha11 = "937842811b9e2eb87c4c19354a1a790315f2669eea58b63264f751de4da5438d"
        $sha12 = "72cff62d801c5bcb185aa299eb26f417aad843e617cf9c39c69f9dde6eb82742"
        $sha13 = "12c5c5d556394aa107a433144c185a686aba3bb44389b7241d84bea766e2aea3"
        $sha14 = "053318adb15cf23075f737daa153b81ab8bd0f2958fa81cd85336ecdf3d7de4e"
        $sha15 = "e6422d97d381f255cd9e9f91f06e5e4921f070b23e4e35edd539a589b1d6aea7"
        $sha16 = "77456c099facd775238086e8f9420308be432d461e55e49e1b24d96a8ea585e8"
        $sha17 = "78f92857e18107872526feb1ae834edb9b7189df4a2129a4125a3dd8917f9983"
        $sha18 = "3de32f315fd01b7b741cfbb7dfee22c30bf7b9a5a01d7ab6690fcb42759a3e9f"
        $sha19 = "fe0f5fef4d78db808b9dc4e63eeda9f8626f8ea21b9d03cbd884e37cde9018ee"
        $sha20 = "74f122fb0059977167c5ed34a7e217d9dfe8e8199020e3fe19532be108a7d607"
    condition:
        any of them
}"
]
